post.description: Validates the request and response against the operatswagger specification

parameters.name: requestResponse
parameters.description: The request and corresponding response to validate.

200.description: Describes the validation result of the live request and response.

default.description: Describes the error response for negative scenarios.

liveRequest.description: Schema for the live request to be validated

liveResponse.description: Schema for the live response to be validated

RequestResponse.description: Describes the live request and response to be validated.

body.description: Parsed body of the request as a JSON.

encoding.description: The encoding of the response body when the body is a buffer.

OperationInfo.description: Describes the operation against which the live request and response validation happened.

operationId.description: The id of the operation against which validation happened. This will help find the problematic information in the spec and will be useful in preparing report.

apiVersion.description: Describes the api-version of the openapi specification. This will help find the openapi spec corresponding to that api-version and will be useful in preparing report.

ValidationResult.description: Describes the validation result of the live request, response validation.

input.description: Provides the body parameter back in the response. This makes it easier to generate reports by correlating input and validation output in one object.

requestValidationResult.description: Describes the validation result of the live request.

responseValidationResult.description: Describes the validation result of the live response.

errors.description: Provides more information about validation for scenarios where no potential operation was found or multiple operations were found or the input was invalid.

RequestValidationResult.description: Describes the validation result of the live request.

successfulRequest.description: Describes the status of live request validation.

operationInfo.description: The corresponding operation in openapi spec that was used for validating the request.

errors.description: Provides more information about live response validation.

ResponseValidationResult.description: Describes the validation result of the live response.

successfulResponse.description: Describes the status of live response validation.

operationInfo.description: The corresponding operation in openapi spec that was used for validating the response.

errors.description: Provides more information about live response validation.

ErrorResponse.description: Describes the error response for negative scenarios.

code.description: The unique error code describing an error.

message.description: The error message providing meaningful information.
